text: ivvidham nam ninakk nam'mute kalpanayal caitan'yavattaya oru sandesam beadhanam nalkiyirikkunnu. vedapustakattepparriyea satyavisvasatte sambandhiccea ninakkeannumariyumayirunnilla. annane a sandesatte namearu veliccamakkiyirikkunnu. atuvali nam'mute dasanmaril ninn nam icchikkunnavare nervaliyil nayikkunnu. tirccayayum ni nermargattilekkan vali natattunnat
